sentences.en: The company has now gone into receivership with debts of several million.
sentences.cn: 公司欠债数百万，现在已进入破产管理阶段。

sentences.en: The company went into receivership with massive debts.
sentences.cn: 该公司负债累累，已经由破产管理人接管。

sentences.en: Three of the hotels are in receivership, and others are teetering on the brink of bankruptcy.
sentences.cn: 有3家宾馆已破产在管，其他几家正在破产的边缘徘徊。

words.tran_cn: [经管]破产管理；破产管理人的职务；破产在管

trans.tran_cn: 破产管理，破产清算，破产在管，[法]破产案产业管理人的职务
trans.tran_en: if a business is in receivership, it is controlled by an official receiver because it has no money
